Teen Wolf Too

Ano: 1987

Sinopse: Following the hairy adventure in Teen Wolf (1985), now Scott Howard's equally unpopular and unathletic cousin, Todd, discovers the family's dirty little secret. And as Todd unexpectedly receives a college boxing scholarship, the cat is out of the bag. Now, there's no turning back--the once-feeble student is a celebrity, catching the eye of the university's pretty girls. However, being a teenage werewolf comes at a price. Will Todd see the error of his ways? Is he willing to accept responsibility for his actions and put his superhuman powers to good use?—Nick Riganas
